entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , New Carlisle
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:16 AM EST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -2.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: New Carlisle 2:00 PM EST Monday 23 January 2023
Temperature: -2.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.4 kPa falling
Humidity: 78 %
Wind Chill: -5
Dewpoint: -6.1°C
Wind: ENE 5 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 2.

entry.title: Monday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 8.

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 60%
